text: You want a raise? For what exactly?
No, we don’t need to talk about mental health. Get back to work.
You're on lunch break? Must be nice to have so much free time.
Why are you working from home again? We can’t babysit you remotely.
We expect full commitment. Vacations should be earned, not taken.
I don’t care if it's 11PM. The deadline is the deadline.
We hired you to solve problems, not complain about them.
I didn’t see you reply in 3 minutes. Are you even online?
This isn’t a democracy. Just do what I said.
You should feel lucky to even have a job right now.
